md:
giải nghĩa từ "hard" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

1. Hard (adjective)
	* Meaning: khó khăn, khó khăn, mạnh mẽ
	* Example: The math problem was hard to solve.
	* Related words: difficult, tough, challenging
	* Antonyms: easy, simple, soft

2. Hard (adverb)
	* Meaning: mạnh mẽ, quyết liệt
	* Example: She worked hard to finish the project on time.
	* Related words: strongly, fiercely, vigorously
	* Antonyms: gently, softly, lightly

3. Hard (noun)
	* Meaning: đá cứng, gỗ cứng
	* Example: The hard wood floor was difficult to install.
	* Related words: stone, rock, solid
	* Antonyms: soft, weak, fragile

Note: Depending on the context, the word "hard" can have different meanings and connotations.

  2. Hard (adverb)

    • Example: She worked hard to finish the project on time.
    • Related words: strongly, fiercely, vigorously

  3. Hard (noun)

Note: Depending on the context, the word "hard" can have different meanings and connotations.
